document.full_text: tunisian authorities have filed new charges against the ousted leader, zine el-abidine ben ali, and his wife over the killing of protesters during the revolt against his rule.
document.title: africa: tunisia: ousted leader faces new charges in protesters' deaths
lines_and_colors: tunisian authorities have filed new charges against the ousted leader, zine el-abidine ben ali, and his wife over the killing of protesters during the revolt against his rule.
